ValidationRule.description: Proposed Service date cannot be modified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT($User.Bypass_Validation__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Process__c,'Notify Customer Of Delay'), ISPICKVAL(Process__c,'Notify Customer Of Service Update') ), ISCHANGED(Proposed_Service_Date__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Proposed Service date cannot be modified.
